modName: Malachite And Moonstone Glass Armour and Weapons
summary: This is my attempt to make the Glass set closer to the colours of the ingredients required to make them, namely malachite and moonstone.
descriptionHtml:
MAM Glass Armour and Weapons
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Versions
++++++++++++++++++
v03 - All armour and weapons are now complete
v02 - Made changes to the colours, the moonstone parts are now less yellow and the malachite parts are a blend of green and blue like refined malachite; changed all weapons except the mace and waraxe; all texture resolutions are now double that of vanilla
v01 - Male and Female armour and shield completed
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

This is my attempt to make the Glass set closer to the colours of the ingredients required to make them, namely malachite and moonstone.

++++++++++++++++++++++
Other Mods
++++++++++++

Moonstone Elven Armour and Weapons:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=634

For those who like darker armour - BGM Armour and Weapons
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2060

+++++++++
Credits
+++++++++
OmicronPress â€“ used his textures to make this mod
author: cmdo
